room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes, "Murder Once More"" by Escape Springfield in Springfield (IL)
room_description:
The streets of London are once more touched by that most insidious of crimes: murder most foul, and no leads to go on. Unfortunately, the city’s premiere detective, Sherlock Holmes, is out on his own business–not that that will stop him from rendering his assistance.
 
“MURDERER’S IDENTITY IS KNOWN (STOP) SEARCH MY PARLOR FOR SOLUTION (STOP) CATCH THE KILLER BEFORE THEY ESCAPE (STOP)”
  
The telegraph message came through not long ago. Now here you are, searching the clues left for you in the parlor of Sherlock Holmes himself. But there’s not much time before the killer skips town; can you solve the mystery in time?
